structure.unit: ARTICLE CLIV. HILLEL PLAT STREET LIGHTING SPECIAL TAXING DISTRICT

text.section: The area or boundaries of this proposed special taxing district are as follows:

A portion of Section 4, Township 52 South, Range 42 East, of Miami-Dade County, Florida (a.k.a Hillel Plat, Tentative Plat # T-23188); being more particularly described as follows:
Tracts 1 through 4, amended plat of Harriette Park No. 2 according to the plat thereof as recorded in Plat Book, Page 38, of the Public Records of Miami-Dade County; thence a portion of the S ½ of the SE ¼ of the SW ¼ of the NE ¼ of said section 4; thence a portion of the N ½ of the S ½ of the NE ¼ of the NW ¼ of the SE ¼ of said Section 4, lying easterly of Big Snake Creek (Oleta River).
AND
Those portions of NE 191 Street (Harper Street), NE 24 Avenue (Oleta Driver), and lots 1 through 48 and the alleys lying within block 4, all as shown on the plat of Harriette Park, as recorded in the Plat Book 17, Page 64, of the Public Records of Miami-Dade County, Florida, lying south of the south right-of-way line of NE 192 Street (Harriette Drive) and west of the west right-of-way of NE 25 Avenue (Grove Avenue). Said lands lying in Miami-Dade County, Florida, of said Section 4.
The area and geographical location of this proposed special taxing district are shown on the Exhibit A map or sketch, and made a part herein by reference.
